entry.title: $2100 // 2 BEDROOM IN PRIVATE HOME IN ASTORIA OF SEMI-GATED COMMUNITY
entry.content:
Near 21st and broadway within a family friendly semi gated community of private townhomes.
Available for rent immediately.
$2100 with heat and hot water included.

Both bedrooms have their own dedicated closet, linen closet in hallway near bathroom and there's also a deep storage closet in unit that can even store bikes!
Downstairs there's space for a stroller or shopping cart along with space on landing of stairs you can use.
Community lawn area where you can picnic or lay out for some sun.

24 hr supermarket, 24 hr rite aid, dry cleaner, Post Office all just 1 block away.
Laundromat steps away.

No alternate side street parking near by or private parking can be rented from our management company for additional cost if available.

Must have great credit.
Previous landlord references
1 month rent & 1 month security
